a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Change in real Disposable Household Income by Income Decile, United
Source: Incomes across the Distribution Database (Nolan, Thewissen, Roser) in levels (2016)
Note: Adjusted for household size, inflation and price differences between countries and expressed in 2011 international dollars. 1st decile is the
cutoff income that separate the poorest 10% from the richest 90% etc. The 5th decile is the median.
